verbs.description: [ARG0: The Washington Post] [V: reports] [ARG1: that Special Counsel Robert Mueller has directly raised the possibility of issuing a subpoena requiring Trump to testify before a grand jury in the Russia investigation . It happened with John Dowd , who is no longer a member of Trump ’s legal team . In a tense meeting in early March with special counsel] …

The Washington Post reports that Special Counsel Robert Mueller [V: has] directly raised the possibility of issuing a subpoena requiring Trump to testify before a grand jury in the Russia investigation . It happened with John Dowd , who is no longer a member of Trump ’s legal team . In a tense meeting in early March with special counsel …
